critique: The document is an executive order issued by President Obama in 2014 in response to the actions of the Russian Federation in Ukraine. It expands the scope of a previous national emergency declaration and imposes sanctions on individuals and entities deemed to be undermining democratic processes and institutions in Ukraine. The order blocks the property and interests of designated persons, suspends their entry into the United States, and prohibits donations to or for their benefit. It also authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to take actions necessary to carry out the order's purposes.
